name: Break The Rules!
description:
The rules are simple - Don't follow the rules!

Controls

Click Left Mouse Button to interact.

Team

Daniel Brunelle - Programmer

Derek Frost - Graphics and Animations

Developer Comments

The decision to join this jam was very last minute and had a very small team of just 2, so developer resources were very tight. Unfortunately there is no sound, just imagine some fantastic Warioware theme music playing in the background.

We came up with a basic micro game heavily inspired by Warioware micro games.

The finished product is not as polished as we wanted it to be but that is the nature of game jams!

 If we had another day for the game jam, we have the sprites for keeping score and adding a bit more character to some of the objects in the game. We'd also make the game loop back to the start  instead of ending on a white screen with no indication of how you did...

Some of the sprites needed to be scaled more than we prepared for, this could easily be fixed with an extra bit of time.

We also would have liked to add a few more microgames into it, but I suppose the small nature of it helped us complete the finish game in under 60 seconds diversifier!
